metadata.title: CVE-2023-29159 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description:
Directory traversal vulnerability in Starlette versions 0.13.5 and laterand prior to 0.27.0 allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to view filesin a web service which was built using Starlette.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-29159` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

python3-starlette - 0.30.0-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: starlette package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.30.0-1').
